description:
The depths of the undead labyrinth force Luciel to keep going, testing his mettle as a healer and an adventurer. What will he find at the end, and what will he find when he finally returns to the surface?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La déclaration de Luciel, exorciste et guérisseur classe S
S Kyuu Chiyushi Ken Taimashi Luciel no Sengen
S-Rank Healer and Exorcist Luciel`s Declaration
S級治癒士兼退魔士ルシエルの宣言
